definition: warp (the vertical threads in weaving)/vertical/longitudinal/north-south (lines of longitude)/lengthwise/to release/to indulge/even if
body/life/oneself/personally/one's morality and conduct/the main part of a structure or body/pregnant/classifier for sets of clothes: suit, twinset/Kangxi radical 158

sentences.english: She cries out to Scarpia and leaps from the battlement.
sentences.chinese: 她厲聲呼喊迫卡皮亞，並從城垛上縱身一躍。

sentences.english: He leapt up from his concealment, but he cowered back.
sentences.chinese: 他從隱蔽處縱身跳出，但又馬上退了回來。

sentences.english: Host poling in hands, Mengke threw himself on the horse, feeling full of strength.
sentences.chinese: 手持套馬杆，縱身躍上馬背，孟克覺得自己充滿力量。

sentences.english: With a shout of fury Hagrid launched himself off the bike at the Death Eater;
sentences.chinese: 海格怒吼一聲，縱身跳出摩托車，朝那個食死徒撲去。

sentences.english: He ran to the edge of the swimming pool and plunged in.
sentences.chinese: 他跑到游泳池邊，一縱身跳進水裏。

sentences.english: He swings down into the water.
sentences.chinese: 他縱身一躍跳進了水中。
你準備好了縱身一躍嗎？

sentences.english: He swung himself into the saddle.
I jumped up , pushed the boat under the water with my feet , and caught one of the ship's ropes .
sentences.chinese: 我縱身一跳，把小船踩入水中，抓住大船的一根纜繩。

sentences.english: The swimmer ran to the side of the swimming pool and dived off.
sentences.chinese: 那游泳者奔到游泳池邊，縱身跳下。

sentences.english: He dashed along the platform and jumped on the train.
sentences.chinese: 他沿站臺猛跑，縱身跳上火車。

sentences.english: She sprang to the door with alacrity.
sentences.chinese: 她輕捷地一縱身向門口跳去。

sentences.english: Another man then ran to the river and jumped on the log with Darrell.
sentences.chinese: 另一個船工跑向河邊，縱身一躍和達瑞爾站在了一起。

sentences.english: The truth throws itself into the abyss when Oedipus resolves the enigma.
sentences.chinese: 真理自己縱身跳入深淵，當伊底普斯解答這個謎團。

sentences.english: He swung himself over the fence.
sentences.chinese: 他縱身一躍跳過了籬笆。

sentences.english: Bottom of trouser-leg, bound up a drastic son fixed go into pond in.
sentences.chinese: 了褲腳，縱身一個猛子扎入水塘中。
